description: Developed and deployed APIs using Spring Boot, AWS, Docker, and EKS to aggregate customer asset and liability data from multiple business domains. Built CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and implemented automated testing using Cucumber and Postman to ensure system reliability.

Developed and deployed APIs using Spring Boot, AWS, Docker, and EKS to manage customer profile data across multiple systems. Built CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and implemented automated testing using Cucumber and Postman to ensure system reliability.

Processed large financial datasets using AWS Glue and automated tasks with AWS Lambda. Built real-time APIs with Spring WebFlux, developed React dashboards used by 100+ analysts, and managed CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and GitHub. Optimized data storage and querying with PostgreSQL to enhance scalability and performance.

Developed event-driven microservices on Azure using Java 17, Spring Boot 3, and Spring Cloud. Integrated services with RabbitMQ, MQ-Series, and Azure Service Bus, leveraging Azure SQL Database and Redis for data storage and caching. Built Angular 16 applications, set up CI/CD pipelines with GitHub and Concourse, and maintained Swagger API documentation. Applied design patterns such as BFF, API gateways, and CQRS.
